title: Project Kickoff Discussion
content: Welcome to the Acme Website Redesign project! Let's use this space to discuss the overall vision and goals for the new website.

replies.content: Excited to get started! I think we should focus on improving the user experience and making the site more mobile-friendly.
Agreed! Also, we should consider implementing a better content management system for easier updates.

title: Design System Questions
content: I have some questions about the design system we'll be using. Should we create a new one from scratch or build upon an existing framework?

replies.content: I'd recommend starting with Tailwind CSS as a foundation. It'll speed up development while still giving us flexibility.

title: Mobile App Architecture
content: Let's discuss the overall architecture for the mobile app. I'm thinking we should go with a React Native solution for cross-platform compatibility.

title: Brand Guidelines Review
content: I've prepared the initial brand guidelines for review. Please take a look and share your feedback on the color palette, typography, and logo concepts.

replies.content: The color palette looks great! I especially like the blue and green combination. Very modern and professional.
Could we explore some warmer tones as well? I think it might help make the brand feel more approachable.
